SEARCH

Class pauseScreenController

java.lang.Object
pauseScreenController
public class pauseScreenController extends Object
Controller class for the pause screen.

pauseScreenController manages the functionality of the pause screen, allowing the user to resume the game, save the progress, exit the game, go to settings, or return to the main menu.

Version:
1.4
Author:
Arleen Hayer
